name: Bloom Charity Nfp
mission: BLOOM Charity’s mission is to support vulnerable children around the world with a holistic approach to their health and well-being.
theoryOfChange: BLOOM Charity states it supports vulnerable children with a holistic approach to health and well-being through programs focused on mental health, nutrition, early childhood development and education, aiming to ensure children have opportunities to laugh, learn, hope and heal.
zakatClaimEvidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://bloomcharity.org/donate (Source: https://bloomcharity.org/donate)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Good donor alignment with manageable risk. Evidence quality is solid but still evolving in places.

components.evidence: Explicit zakat program (+4); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: masakin (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Humanitarian service (+2)

components.name: Underserved Space

alignment.rationale: Alignment 45/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

score_details.score_summary: BLOOM Charity shows exceptional alignment and strong impact, with zakat compliance.

zakat.claim_evidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://bloomcharity.org/donate (Source: https://bloomcharity.org/donate)

all_citations.claim: BLOOM Charity holds a Charity Navigator score of 89.5/100.
The charity reported total revenue of $158,297 and a program expense ratio of 98.7%.
The organization is zakat-eligible and provides a policy for asnaf categories.
BLOOM provides enrichment experiences and advocates for children in crisis.
New PlayGardens were completed in Fes and Errachidia to provide children with outdoor access.
The charity provided meals in Gaza and continued building PlayGardens.
The organization focuses on providing orphans with daily access to play and the outdoors.
BLOOM planned handicap accessible PlayGardens to expand inclusivity.
The charity offers various donation options for humanitarian support.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: BLOOM Charity earns a high overall rating due to its extraordinary financial efficiency and direct impact model, maintaining a Charity Navigator score of 89.5/100.
areas_for_improvement: Relatively small total revenue base of $158,297 may limit the scale of international interventions.
Increasing public disclosure of long-term impact metrics beyond annual outputs.

dimension_explanations.alignment: BLOOM Charity shows strong alignment with donor values as a ZAKAT-ELIGIBLE organization that addresses urgent humanitarian needs [3]. Its focus on orphans and children in crisis provides a high donor fit for those prioritizing vulnerable youth and mental health advocacy [7][9].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization achieves high impact through direct provision of services, including building PlayGardens in Fes and Errachidia and providing meals in Gaza [5][6]. With a program expense ratio of 98.7% and a low cost per beneficiary, the charity demonstrates high financial health and evidence-based effectiveness in its humanitarian missions [1][2].

baseline_narrative.headline: BLOOM Charity empowers children in crisis through specialized enrichment programs and the creation of therapeutic play environments.
strengths: Exceptional program expense ratio of 98.7%, ensuring nearly all funds directly support children.
Highly efficient fundraising operations, spending only $0.03 to raise every $1.
Strong financial stability with 21.3 months of working capital available.
baseline_narrative.summary: BLOOM Charity is a non-profit organization dedicated to advocating for children in crisis by providing essential services and mental health support [4]. The organization operates key initiatives such as Morocco's Magical PlayGardens and emergency mobilization efforts to ensure vulnerable children have access to play and nutrition [6][8].

bbb_assessment.summary: BBB assessment data is not currently available for this organization.

case_against.mitigation_notes: The organization mitigates its size by maintaining hyper-efficient operations and focusing on specific, high-impact interventions like PlayGardens and targeted meal distribution.
risk_factors: <cite id="3">Small revenue base limits operational scale</cite>
case_against.summary: The primary limitation for BLOOM Charity is its current financial scale, with <cite id="3">$158,297 in total revenue</cite>, which may restrict its ability to respond to massive, concurrent global crises.

confidence.notes: Strong data availability for outputs and financials.

alignment.explanation: BLOOM Charity is an excellent fit for Muslim donors, as it is <cite id="8">zakat-eligible</cite> and operates in high-need, Muslim-majority regions like Palestine and Pakistan.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust BLOOM Charity due to its Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid and an <cite id="9">overall score of 89.89.5/100 from Charity Navigator</cite>, which includes perfect scores of <cite id="11">100 for Culture and Leadership</cite>.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility further, the charity could expand its board of directors to enhance independent oversight.

impact.explanation: The charity demonstrates exceptional effectiveness with a <cite id="4">98.7% program expense ratio</cite> and a highly efficient cost model of approximately <cite id="12">$6.80 per beneficiary</cite>.
impact.improvement: If reserves are above policy target, document why and publish triggers for planned deployment.

rich_narrative.headline: BLOOM Charity empowers children in crisis through specialized enrichment programs and the creation of therapeutic play environments.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to support highly efficient, targeted interventions for vulnerable children in crisis zones, particularly those seeking zakat-eligible opportunities with zero overhead waste.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill zakat obligations with confidence
Prioritize charities with maximum financial efficiency and low overhead
Care deeply about psychosocial support and therapeutic environments for orphans
giving_considerations: Organization operates on a smaller scale compared to massive international NGOs
Focuses heavily on specific interventions like PlayGardens alongside emergency relief
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors looking to fund large-scale infrastructure projects or those who prefer organizations with massive global operational footprints.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: The charity tracks clear output metrics (e.g., meals provided, PlayGardens built) and holds a Platinum Candid seal, but lacks rigorous third-party RCT evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: BLOOM Charity improves the quality of life for at-risk children by providing therapeutic play environments and direct emergency relief.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Tracking specific outputs like meals and built environments ensures that donor funds are translating into tangible benefits for vulnerable children.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: With a small revenue base and highly efficient operations, the charity has significant room to absorb additional funding to scale its PlayGarden and emergency relief programs.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by an unparalleled <cite id="4">98.7% program expense ratio</cite> and specialized focus on therapeutic play environments.
peer_comparison.peer_group: International child welfare and humanitarian organizations

similar_organizations.differentiator: Massive global footprint and diverse program areas
similar_organizations.name: Islamic Relief USA

strengths.detail: The organization maintains a <cite id="4">98.7% program expense ratio</cite>, ensuring maximum impact for every donation.
BLOOM Charity spends only <cite id="5">$0.03 to raise every $1</cite>, demonstrating extremely lean administrative and development operations.
The charity delivers significant direct aid in emergency zones, such as providing <cite id="6">700,000 meals in Gaza</cite> in 2024.

strengths_deep_dive: BLOOM Charity's operational model is defined by its extraordinary financial efficiency and direct impact approach. By maintaining a <cite id="4">98.7% program expense ratio</cite> and spending just <cite id="5">$0.03 to raise every $1</cite>, the organization ensures that donor funds are maximized for beneficiary support. This efficiency translates into concrete outcomes, such as the construction of <cite id="7">11 PlayGardens</cite> and the delivery of <cite id="6">700,000 meals in Gaza</cite>. The charity's commitment to transparency is further validated by its <cite id="9">overall score of 89.89.5/100 from Charity Navigator</cite> and its Platinum status with Candid.
rich_narrative.summary: BLOOM Charity is a dedicated non-profit organization established in <cite id="1">2017</cite> that focuses on empowering vulnerable children and orphans through specialized enrichment programs and therapeutic play environments. Operating across multiple regions including <cite id="2">Morocco, Palestine, Pakistan, and Egypt</cite>, the organization delivers direct humanitarian aid and psychosocial support. In 2023, the charity reported <cite id="3">$158,297 in total revenue</cite>, demonstrating a highly focused operational model. BLOOM Charity is distinguished by its remarkable financial efficiency, maintaining an exceptional <cite id="4">98.7% program expense ratio</cite>, ensuring that every possible dollar is directed toward its mission. The organization has also demonstrated strong fundraising efficiency, spending just <cite id="5">$0.03 to raise every $1</cite>. Its impact is tangible, particularly in crisis zones; for example, in 2024, the charity provided <cite id="6">700,000 meals in Gaza</cite> and successfully <cite id="7">built 11 PlayGardens</cite>. The organization is <cite id="8">zakat-eligible</cite>, serving the fuqara and masakin categories, making it a strong fit for Muslim donors seeking to fulfill their religious obligations while supporting child welfare and emergency relief. Furthermore, BLOOM Charity holds an <cite id="9">overall score of 89.89.5/100 from Charity Navigator</cite> and has earned a Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid, reflecting its commitment to accountability and clear outcome reporting.
